channel.title: Looking for coders to help work on a new project
channel.description:
I'm looking for one or two programmers/coders to help me work on a server/client. I plan to have a website, webclient, forum, advertisting. I'm looking for two people who can patch, add customs, donator system, vote system, etc. I can't pay you right now, but once the server is up (the sooner the better) i can start to pay you.
fill this out if interested:
What type of server are you most comfortable with?(317 etc): How much experience do you have in coding rsps?: Willing to split payments for VPS, ect?(It's perfectly okay if you aren't): Age: What else can you code apart from rsps?: Hours available per day: Would you prefer coding the server by yourself or with another coder?: Got skype, windows live messenger, AIM? Add anything notable here:
Comment on here and I will PM you to get in closer contact.
I plan to run this project for a while and i'm willing to pay the fees until the server picks up.
Thanks

item.title: Looking for coders to help work on a new project
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

wrong section/post in development teams
